conversation_history.user_message:
```def _format_ai_response(self, raw_response: str) -> str:
        """Format the AI response for more natural style"""
        if not raw_response:
            return "damn, my brain just froze fr"
            
        # Extract the actual response text
        ai_response = raw_response.strip()
        
        # Remove any leading indicators
        ai_response = re.sub(r'^(You:|Your response:|ChronoChunk:|Response:|Bot:)\s*', '', ai_response, flags=re.IGNORECASE)
        
        # Force lowercase
        ai_response = ai_response.lower()
        
        # Fix multiple question marks - never more than one
        ai_response = re.sub(r'\?{2,}', '?', ai_response)
        
        # Fix multiple exclamation marks - never more than one
        ai_response = re.sub(r'!{2,}', '!', ai_response)
        
        # Fix spacing around punctuation
        ai_response = re.sub(r'\s+([.,?!])', r'\1', ai_response)
        
        # Ensure no excessive repetition of phrases
        repetitive_phrases = [
            "damn bro u sayin",
            "u fr think",
            "u really think",
            "my g",
            "fr fr",
            "no cap no cap"
        ]
        
        for phrase in repetitive_phrases:
            # If phrase appears more than once, replace second+ occurrences
            if ai_response.count(phrase) > 1:
                # Find first occurrence
                first_pos = ai_response.find(phrase)
                # Replace subsequent occurrences
                ai_response = ai_response[:first_pos+len(phrase)] + ai_response[first_pos+len(phrase):].replace(phrase, "")
        
        # Limit to 1-3 sentences for more natural flow
        sentences = re.split(r'(?<=[.!?])\s+', ai_response)
        if len(sentences) > 3:
            ai_response = ' '.join(sentences[:3])
        
        # Ensure only one emoji maximum
        emoji_pattern = re.compile(r'[\U0001F600-\U0001F64F\U0001F300-\U0001F5FF\U0001F680-\U0001F6FF\U0001F700-\U0001F77F\U0001F780-\U0001F7FF\U0001F800-\U0001F8FF\U0001F900-\U0001F9FF\U0001FA00-\U0001FA6F\U0001FA70-\U0001FAFF\U00002702-\U000027B0\U000024C2-\U0001F251]+')
        emojis = emoji_pattern.findall(ai_response)
        if len(emojis) > 1:
            # Keep only the first emoji
            for emoji in emojis[1:]:
                ai_response = ai_response.replace(emoji, '')
        
        # Fix specific phrases that don't match desired style
        style_fixes = {
            "u fr think dat": "u think that",
            "u fr think teh": "u think the",
            "???": "?",
            "??": "?",
            "!!": "!",
            "!?!": "!",
            "?!?": "?",
        }
        
        for bad, good in style_fixes.items():
            ai_response = ai_response.replace(bad, good)```
